scripts.enable: kwriteconfig5 --file kwinrc --group Plugins --key yanjing true && qdbus org.kde.KWin /KWin reconfigure
scripts.start: npm run --silent build && npm run --silent kwin:is_installed && { npm run --silent kwin:upgrade; echo UPGRADED; } || { npm run --silent kwin:install && echo INSTALLED; }
scripts.package: npm run --silent build && zip --exclude \*.spec.js --recurse-paths yanjing.kwinscript contents/ LICENSE metadata.json
scripts.version: npm run --silent package && git add -- metadata.json yanjing.kwinscript
